organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Covered in this guide is the application of surge protective devices (SPD) and surge protective circuits (collectively called surge protectors) used to protect information and communication technology (ICT) circuits, including smart grid. This guide is not intended to cover individual surge protective components. Specifically excluded from this guide are stand-alone ac power protectors.
